item.title: FO - Search - Search product bar, consult autocomplete list
item.description: FO - Search - Search product bar, consult autocomplete list Details Component : Core Status : [TEST] To be automated Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-5102 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to FO > Click on the search bar on the header > Write a word on it (min 3 characters length) * The autocomplete list is displayed with 2 products * The search bar in the header keeps the word written Click outside The autocomplete list is not displayed Case 1: With “Mug” products

item.description: FO - Search - Sort results list Details Component : Core Status : IN REVIEW Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-5106 Steps Step Description Expected result On FO > Search products in search bar A page with the search result should be displayed. 5 items found Sorted by Relevance sort by Name A to Z Items are sorted from A to Z sort by Name Z to A Items are sorted from Z to A Sort by Price, low to high Items are sorted by Price, low to high Sort by Price, high to low Items are sorted by Price, high to low sort by Relevance Items are sorted by Relevance

item.title: FO - Search - Consult product quickview
item.description: FO - Search - Consult product quickview Details Component : Core Status : IN REVIEW Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-5107 Steps Step Description Expected result FO > do a search and click enter Search results page for “mug” Found 5 products Put your mouse over the product “Customizable mug” The button “Quickview” should be displayed Click on the “Quickview” button You should have a modal with : * On the left : an enlarged image of the one selected on its right
